2: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
3: Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun.
4: This is the real secret of life -- to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
5: Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
6: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
